content: **introduction ** the baby s lacy springtime beanie pattern provides instructions for crocheting a feminine and delicate beanie with a beautiful flower applique for newborns to three-month-old babies it is quick and easy to work up yet it maintains a very sweet and elegant look with the lacy effect from the stitches while this is a beginner-friendly crochet pattern there are many ways to customize this hat including using different yarn colors adding other or additional embellishments e g buttons bows or adjusting the size by increasing stitch counts and row to fit larger head sizes this is the perfect handmade gift for expecting mothers baby showers and newborns **finished measurements ** approximately 12 5 inches in circumference and 5 inches in height size newborn 0 month to 3 months **level ** beginner requires familiarity with stitches used below and changing colors **stitches/terms used us terminology ** magic_ring magic_ring a k a magic_ring magic loop skip a st skip a stitch single_crochet single_crochet double_crochet double_crochet slip_stitch slip_stitch insert hook yarn over pull through both loops double_crochet-increase double_crochet increase two double_crochet in same stitch blo back loops only approximately 12 5 inches in circumference and 5 inches in height ~~~ this pattern is © 2018 sweet softies for personal use only you may not copy alter or sell this pattern in any way you may sell finished items made with this pattern if you credit sweet softies as the designer and link to my website www sweetsofties com or facebook page www facebook com/sweetsofties no wholesale www sweetsofties com www instagram com/sweetsofties @sweetsofties https //www ravelry com/designers/sweet-softies www etsy com/shop/sylemn www facebook com/sweetsofties www youtube com/sweetsofties
